text:
Hey Fat Moe's, thanks for shoving a food menu in my motel door at 7am and waking me up. You could have put your lame-ass menu on the door knob, it actually has a cut-out to go on the door handle. But instead, your retard employee took several minutes shoving it loudly into the door frame, so that it actually came into my motel room, waking me up.

It was bad enough that I barely got any sleep, thanks for ruining my first day in Vegas. I'll be sure to never buy anything from you Fat Moe.

Ok where to start the pizza I ordered from here about 2 days ago first off the person who took my order was the most unpleasant person I've ever ordered from the it took about an hour and a half to get it and it was cold and hard the sauce was bland and the dough was raw WARNING TO ALL do not eat here u will get sick

This is my absolute go-to for buffalo wings! Big wings, cooked perfectly, with yummy yummy sauce (and they have blue cheese!). They're super nice on the phone and they deliver quickly, the food is always hot and lovely!

NY Style Pizza! Top 3 in town! Wings are excellent as well! Service is friendly, a lot more preferable than Verrazano's in the nearby area! Cheaper prices as well using more expensive ingredients! I am a regular customer and have turned my back on Verrazano's on Rainbow/Flamingo for this place!

So I just moved into the area and have passed by this place almost daily so finally I decided to give it a try and I can say that  I have found my new spot for pizza and wings!!! The pizza was fresh and the crust was crispy (even though I took a little longer to pick it up) the wings were amazing, I wasn't very happy about having to pay 75 cents for ranch but after seeing how big the cups of ranch were and how great it tastes I,d gladly pay $1 per cup. Also I ordered 4 (really only needed 2) and they threw in 2 more for free! Customer service was amazing, I was greeted with a big smile and greeting as soon as I walked in the door. If you're looking for pizza and wings for 2 people your best bet would be the XL one topping pizza and a half bucket of wings, chances are you won't be able to finish it and you'll have leftovers for the next day (win/win). I can honestly say that no matter where I end up in Vegas I will make the trip to Fat Moe's Pizza & Wings!

I happened to stop by this place as I was waiting for my dad to get a haircut next door.  I saw a sign that said "2 slices of pizza and a drink for $4.95." I walked in and was greeted by the nicest guy.  When the pizza came out it tasted fresh and awesome! Since I've moved to Vegas, I haven't found a place that sold food this good for that cheap! The service here was great and I'll definitely stop by again next time I am in the area!

I have ordered from this place many many times and I have always been pretty pleased obviously with my repeat business however today I chose to use an app which provided a discount. I have always paid full price so I figured today why not I made the mistake of ordering the BLT and Fries which I've ordered before and as I mentioned previously was obviously pleased well today I don't know if the chef was going through something personal or if they were running short on bread and food and I don't know what the problem was today but they will never have to worry about me ordering anything from them again I will never ever eat at fat Moe's again what they served for food today was a disgrace they should have been embarrassed eff  fat Moe's. It only takes one time to disappoint me especially when I'm spending my my my hard-earned dollars there whether it's full price or discount I purchased food and what you served was something I can even put a name to and did it with a smile unbelievable!

Oh my God you guys. This place has THE BEST BBQ wings in town. This hidden gem has perfected their recipe to the point where my husband would eat them everyday if I let him. 

AND THEIR RANCH IS HOME MADE. 

Nothing compares to this place. We'll go out and try other wing joints, but we always go back to Moe's. 

The staff is always kind and courteous and we seriously love this place. The price is great and we always come back! Do yourself a favor and order 20 BBQ wings, ranch included.
Fast place to get good food at good prices. Food came hot and fresh (chicken wings and tenders).

They make the best new York pizza in town.
Also all the food is great wings, gyro are all great. I know pizza I'm from New York.
Stopped in here for some food before heading to the airport for my flight home to east coast. Had the special 2 slices and a drink 4.95 and yes it was great pizza

I walked out of fresh and easy and I thought I'd give fat Moe's  a shot. I ordered a pineapple and chicken pizza. Delicious, never had breaded chicken on pizza before. Different taste, I will definitely return.

Best customer service in Las Vegas, extremely polite. The food was outstanding, we ordered the philly burger and a double bacon cheese burger. Plenty of food for a great price. Definitely will return!

Only reason they didn't get two stars was because the guys working there were super cute. I had a slice if pepperoni pizza and it definitely was the greasiest slice of pizza ever. Besides the grease it was just ok. The service was great and fast. This place is convenient if your waiting at the nailshop like I was...

Ordered from here just awhile ago as I was craving pizza for dinner and I saw some of the reviews about this place and about how good the wings and pizza are and I thought I'd give this place a shot today from the time I called in for the order there was kind of a miscommunication about what area to deliver the pizza at as they weren't sure about the address I gave them but it got fixed when I explained it to them. Also found out the most of the prices on the menu went up so they really need to update there menu so people who are new to ordering from a place like me will know and there regular customers will know also they told me it would be a 15 dollar delivery charge with my order which I think was ridiculous and highway robbery but companies will find away to get more money out of you one way or another. Now onto the food the driver delivers my food I pay him expect the change back and he's not sure what to give me back I think he knew just didn't want to come out of his pocket to give me the exact change but whatever I get my food pizza is really delicious probably not as good as some of the mom and pop pizza places I went to but for the quality you get it's good. The chicken wings were good a few wings were overcooked more then others but it was still good would love to try there fries but I might order them the next time I order from here overall with some of the positives and negatives I mentioned this place is not that bad and it might be better then some of the other different pizza places that I didn't have much of a good experience if they didn't charge as much as they did for the delivery charge this place and if some of the wings weren't overcooked and the other problem I mentioned with the delivery driver this place would easily get 5 stars from me but overall I see myself checking this place out again when I get a chance.

Awful food. Pretty sure it was frozen pizza. Fingers were disgusting ..drenched in sauce and odd seasonings that tasted horrible. Special was 2 slices and drink and gave options for toppings but can really only get cheese.  False advertising. Last but not least did not get my drink that was part of the "2 slice and drink special" Would never go back and would give zero stars if possible. Waste of money.

Driving by I noticed a sign that said "under new management" so normally to me this means they are new and improved, so I stopped in to order some dinner to go.

I decided on the Gyro special they have for $5.95 which includes a Lamb and Beef Gyro, French Fries, and a drink.  So the pricing is very reasonable.  The Gyro was decent and fries were delicious and both a good size portion.

They serve a variety of food options, like pizza, burgers and wings.  The pizza actually looked really good and I saw the dough being hand stretched and tossed and you can purchase a one toping pie for 6.99  I hear the wings are awesome, so I will need to return to try these next time. 

The owner tries to be nice and accommodating and the place is nice and clean.  The place sat pretty empty while I was there with mainly takeout orders being fulfilled.  Overall this was an okay find and will definitely update my review on my next visit when I will attempt to try their wings!

First time trying this place. Nice hole in the wall. The man at the cashier was so nice from his greeting to checking on how the food was before he walked out the door. Prices were good. Food was served quick. It's located in a shopping center so there is plenty of parking. It's a hot day today so only feedback I would have is maybe adjust the AC or add some extra big fans in there. I don't mind coming back and trying some of the other food on the menu.
We got here by accident since we were looking for a Wells Fargo ATM. The guy at from counter was really nice and patient since I couldn't decide what I wanted. Everything looks so good!

I ordered slice of pizza that was not fresh so I asked him to make me whole fresh pizza with a drink so he sold me a fountain and when I was going to get a fountain drink they were out of every thing accept lemonade I told him there is no coke he goes take a can from fridge and I did and pour in my cup it wasn't  even half way I asked him to give me another one he told me there is no more i told him then give a small so I can fill he said that's more so he can't give it to me. It was so upsetting I paid $2 for a cup of drink where there was no fountain or can and he can't give small. They should shut down the business if they can't provide that.

I love this restaurant! I eat here a few times a month. I always order the Philly Cheesesteaks. They're the best I've ever had! They have good pizza, fries and wings as well. Everything I've ordered has been delicious, the prices are good, it's delivered on time and the service is great.

Im close to this place, it has many options to choose from. Pizza, wings, phillies, gyro's etc. I've tried all the stuff I've mentioned, never let me down. They're prices are very good around $9 on average plate.

First time in this place and I have lived in this area of town for a little over a year. I am so happy my boyfriend and I stumbled upon this place :) I love their mild flavored wings! It beats any other place it town! Definitely will see me here again :)
This place was shitty years ago. I had to work late so the wife wanted pizza and wings... GARBAGE. THIS SHIT IS GARBAGE.  Now Angelinas dont sound so bad.
Been ordering from here almost every Thursday & It's because the chicken wings are delish!!! After a while the old man is nice. I love fat moes!!!!

Uhh not everything at Fat Moe's is too be believed. Granted, the cheesesteak is decent using Cheese Wiz, but all hell broke loose upon ordering the lasagna. It tasted frozen or canned and after contacting employee to complain, it turns out they are serving frozen lasagna and who knows what other crap they are dishing out in the back. Nothing can overcome some place charging me $8 for stouffer's frozen lasagna. A bunch of scammers as usual.
They have fast and friendly service, but I was disappointed with the pizza, after the guy on the phone indicated it was so great.

Very disappointed. I've been here a few times and I try my best to keep trying it and maybe it will be better but today it was horrible once again. I gave them a few chances but I'm going to stop coming. First the lesbian chick seems like she hates being there because of her shitty attitude, but it's funny because I tipped and her whole attitude changed. My husband decide to get chicken fingers and they're burnt and very small, I decided to get the fettuccine, with a salad and two little pieces of garlic bread. The fettuccine smelt horrible and I threw it up and have a real bad stomach ache. Very disappointed and never going back. Please beware Smh

it was national pizza day and i refused to go to  pizza hut or dominos or any other pizza chain, so i busted out the yelp app and typed 'pizza'. Fat Moes came up, saw some people praising the wings so i ordered on the website.

super glad i did, the pizza was above average. crust was crispy yet chewy and thin but not thick, trust me it will not disappoint. 

as for the wings... they do it damn right!  crispy outs juicy ins but not undercooked.  just right.  and their ranch is everything.  thanks FAT MOES! you've got my loyalty.  will definitely be back.

we order pizza here A LOT!  it is the only thing we have tried and it is great.  i have tried many pizza places in town and this is one of the better ones.  the prices are great as well.  they do, however, have pretty bad delivery service so it's best to just go pick it up :)

My grandkids were visiting and we didn't feel like leaving the house so we decided to order from Fat Moe's because we had a flyer. We had never ordered from there before. It was fabulous! The portions are so filling and the food was fresh and hot! We had the ravioli and beef, the chef salad, and the chicken fingers/fries dinner. The ravioli came with a side salad. We have leftovers for tomorrow and our total bill including the $2 delivery charge was $29. The driver was courteous and when I called to let them know how pleased we were they were so appreciative and gracious. We will be ordering there a lot in the future! Try it!!!

Ordered delivery. Pizza was undercooked, soggy,  and all the toppings come off in one bite. Mozzarella sticks were very undercooked, cheese was cold and hard in the middle. Wings were ok but barely had any sauce. Will not order again.

I've found my new Pizza  and Wing spot the Ranch at this place is off the chain the beat I've ever tasted omg I'd buy it by gallons if I could!! The service here is also the best very friendly and makes me feel very welcome when I come in . Make me feel like I've come into one of my relatives house very warm and inviting and really good energy . I will continue to eat there every day of the week and twice on Sunday . Keep up the great work and making that Ranch dressing i love the wings and the pizza  thank you for making me feel like family.
They have the best Philly steak Sandwich and fries I've ever have.  I really recomen you to give it a try.
The greatest staff! The whole menu is delicious! If you're looking for great food. They won't disappoint!

There were 9 reviews that talked about how good the ranch was here, so I just had to try it. The verdict is in, and it's amazingly good! The first time I stopped in, I ordered the spicy garlic fingers and fries. The guy who took my order seemed to be the owner and he was nice enough. My food was cooked fresh and came out piping hot. The fingers were a good size and I enjoyed the spicy garlic flavor. The fries were hot and crispy and they even used foil to separate the fries so they wouldn't get soggy sitting in finger sauce. That visit they would have gotten 4 stars from me for sure. 

However. A couple weeks later a coworker and decided to order pizza and wings for delivery. We ordered the Fat Moe's special that is lke a supreme with 8 different toppings, and we ordered bbq wings. The pizza was sooo under cooked. The toppings were just about raw and the dough was not much better. Whenever we would pick up a piece of pizza, it would cave into a pile onto the plate. It could have used a few more minutes in the oven for sure. Reading some of the reviews now it seems like this is a common complaint. I can't say I will never eat here again, but if I do it will be dine in only.

Extremely upset with the fact that I submitted an order, and 20 minutes later I get a call saying the order wasn't submitted in time before closing? If these people don't want to work they should shorten their business hours. 2 weeks & I haven't received my refund. I ordered before the pizza is bad. But the wings and garlic fries are good!

I like their wings. That's about all that I get here, aside from the fried mushrooms. They deliver, they're fast and they're close to where we live. I think these are the only reasons we try this place out as often as we do.
First time ordering food from this place and overall bad experience. Terrible food, driver came 25 minutes late and no worth the prices they charged. Don't give yourself the headache.

I didn't even get a chance to try the pizza bc the woman with a very strong accent taking my info couldn't understand my address. After repeating the spelling of my street name 4 times, I hung up. Very disappointed bc the reviews are great!

Ordered  pizza for pick up because I was in a hurry. They didn't start making it till after I got there. Even after they confirmed I was on my way while I was on my way. He gave me some free soda so I gave him 2 extra stars.

Omg!! The best pizza I have had in a very long time. I ordered the BBQ Chicken and it was amazing. The perfect BBQ sauce to pizza ratio. Not too dry, not too wet. I definitely will be coming back! Yum.
Pizza was decent for the price. Guys at the counter were really nice and seemed to like working there.

Wow? The new owners make a huge difference! The pizza was delicious and super reasonably prices. The wings were classic and crunchy. I couldn't believe how different the food tasted. So freaking yummy!

I just had a delicious meal from Fat Moe's Pizza and Wings. I was craving spaghetti and meatballs and I stopped in and ordered some. It was ready in about 8 minutes. The menu didn't mention it but it came with a nice salad and some really good garlic bread. The meal was under $10, the man who took my order was nice and the place looked really clean.

Very disappointed I ordered from here once before and it was great.  This time around my pizza was burnt so bad I ate one whole slice and cut part of another one and gave up it tasted so bad. Thought I found a great pizza place! I would  have rather waited longer to get my pizza, and it not be burnt. whoever made this pizza had to have seen it was burnt.

Ordered a medium pepperoni an onion pizza and a Italian sub no mayo the pizza was ok but the Italian sub they put mayo on it, which seems to be a west coast thing ,you would get shot puttin mayo on an Italian sub back in Providence or Boston where i used to live an the sub was lousy as you see in the pictures it's 2 slices of ham that looks like they bought it from Albertsons the oscar meyer kind it had 2 pieces of salami an American chz and a tossed salad with about 4 ounces of Italian dressing ewww it was sooo gross ,where was the provolone? Mortadella? Capacola?bologna?  They must have a food cost problem there but all in all its only my first time calling there if i ever call back it won't be for no Italian that's for sure

Uhm, omg, I love this place now! I live in the area and was looking for an alternative to the big chain pizza places and am so glad my boyfriend and I stumbled upon Moe's. He ordered a big man pizza with all the meats and I got a white pizza. We both loved our selections. We also shared mozzarella sticks that I'm now obsessed with along with an order of fries, which were also really delicious. The amount of money we spent would have been used on a couple pizzas and an appetizer at a big pizza chain, so the value was also good. We ordered delivery and the time it took was comparable to the chains too. Overall, this was a win for us.

Bad customer service, if people can't be nice to a paying customer why are you even working? Wings were alright, definitely not good enough to come back. Wings weren't ready when they said they would be for pick up.

Very good pizza but over priced. They also want to nickel and dime you to change toppings, drink refills, extra ranch, etc. There are many better places in the area to go to than here. I would not recommend it to anyone.
Love their food and their prices. The owners and staff are very friendly. Their specials are great too. Their pizza and wings are my favorite in Vegas.
Really yummy food that is made on the spot and fresh!! Also the owner is incredibly welcoming and sweet!
Super friendly service, and the wings are great! Definitely will come back, and definitely recommend.
Very sweet gentle men's , good  prices and very good food . Gonna come back for sure !!

My boyfriend and I have been ordering (delivery) pizza and wings from here for about 5 months. The food is great! But their service is awful! We either are missing extras we requested or it takes 60 min+ for the food to arrive. (they are appx. a 1/2 mile away from us). I gotta say, if we didn't like their pizza so much, we would have dismissed this place a long time ago. (wrote this about  month ago)

update: Ordered pizza and wings from them a week or two ago and the delivery guy showed up 2 hours after the pizza was ordered, after I had already spoken to the manager and he had offered to make a new pizza and wings if I came to pick it up. He also said they would credit my account $20 so the next time we got pizza and wings it would be free. 

today: Attempted to redeem my free pizza and wings and they guy on the phone said that we had a credit for 25% off our next order. I explained to him the situation and asked to speak to a manager. He said he would call me back. When he did, he offered a $15 minimum delivery and anything additional would be on us. HORRIBLE customer service. I'm not sure if they just have very consistent turn-over or what. But we are done trying to justify the food vs the service. I hope the owner reads this and does some serious hiring. So disappointing...

I've ate here about 4 times now. The pizza has been pretty good. It's very greasy and you can actually see the balls of grease on top but it really is yummy. We got the wings twice, the first time we ate in and the second time we ordered and picked up. The first time they were so amazing! juicy and covered in sauce with the perfect amount. The second time we ate the wings we ordered around 11:15 just after they opened. They told us to pick up in about 20 mins. We went there in 20 mins and asked about the pizza. They told us it will be another minute so we stuck around and waited for an additional 20mins. The guy just put our pizza in when we got there. Whats the point of ordering ahead? And he didn't tell us either. I could have went somewhere and came back and I wouldn't have minded so much but he made it sound like it was almost done. When we got the wings home they were either day old wings or way over cooked because they were the driest thing I ever ate. I haven't got anything from there since but I suggest if you go, dine in.
So good ! This place is so cheap and so good the owner is so nice and they have great pizza the crust is amazing

I would give a zero stars if I could! First of all the whole ordering process for delivery was completely terrible! She was rude and was rushing me when telling her what I wanted. Then when I said card for payment I was pulling my card out of my wallet, and she said "can you hurry? I have someone on the other line." Then she hung up on me! I called back and she put me on hold for 4 minutes before she took my card info then she said thanks then hung up on me. My card online says I was charged 5 dollars more then she said and called them back and the women called me a liar. It's been 30 minuets, still no food. Never will eat here again!!!! She should be fired and I will write this review on every website I find them on.
Really good pizza for the price. We got the 2 slices and a drink special for $4.95 and it's not to far from the strip.

I drive by here a lot and decided to stop in at random.  What an awful decision.  It was around 1 PM on a weekend and the place was deserted. 

 I got a burger, fries, and a slice of pizza.  The slice was OK.  I mean it wasn't bad but it wasn't good.  Relatively thin crust, a bit greasy but not too much.  I'd rather have Papa John's.  The fries were hot, fresh, and decent.  Seasoned a bit weird, though.  Towards the end I got a bite of a fry that had been covered in black pepper and it took a toll on my tastebuds.

The burger, though, was inexcusable.  Bun and toppings were fine, but the burger itself was disgusting and easily the worst burger I've ever been served at any restaurant.  If you're familiar with the boxes of burgers you can get at the store, like 100 frozen uncooked burgers, that's what these were.  I'm not sure if there is a ton of soy protein or what but they tasted exactly the same.  If you're not familiar, let me just say that they can be best described as "some food".  If you don't think about it, it has a neutral taste and a weird mouthfeel, at best.  If you do think about it, you'll start to notice the weird aftertaste as well.

I know people who grew up eating these burgers all the time, so if that's your thing then go for it.  For me, though, I'd rather eat an hour old burger from McDonalds or any other fast food place.  I ended up very sick to my stomach for the next couple of hours.

I remember seeing some other stuff on their menu like spaghetti and meatballs and joking to myself "Ha, I wouldn't be surprised if they just cracked open a can of Chef Boyardee."  After reading one of the other reviews below that indicated that they serve frozen lasagna it may not be as much of a joke as I thought.  

The prices are relatively cheap.  The faux burger combo was less than $5 and the slice was $1.75.  Free refills and free delivery if you're so inclined.   Service was fine and the people seemed nice enough, but the food ranges from below average to disgusting.  I'd stay away.

YELP 365 CHALLENGE 2014-(288/365)  "The Gyro Special"

This place is under new management, and  you can tell, because they advertise Pizza and Wings, but Wifey got us some Gyros!?!?

$5.95 gets you a Gyro,  fries, and a drink...not bad! It was a mix of beef and lamb which was pretty tasty. Fries  were good and very plentiful. Overall,  the food
portions were pretty generous as well. Was it the best Gyro I ever had?  No, but the price point and amount of food was a great deal.

Right now, it's A- Ok for me , but I wouldn't mind trying their pizza and wings, since it's called Fat Moe's Pizza and Wings!  ALOHA!!!

Shaka Meter: \uuu/  \uuu/  \uuu/  3

They have a combo of 2 slices of pizza and a drink for $5. It was a great value and tasted pretty decent. It's not supposed to be a gourmet pizza or anything like that but for the value I think it was pretty good. The service was friendly and attentive. Not much of an ambiance but again I think this is more of a quick bite to eat for cheap kind of place.

We wanted.to give this place a try since its been open a while. The person who took our order didn't seem like he wanted customers, and that is a huge deal for me.  The place was empty and they are open for another two hours. We got charged an extra $1.50 just for wanting a half meat half Hawaiian pizza. We were told this after the order was wrung up. We really didn't want the same whole pizza but I have never had to pay extra. I hope the pizza is better than the service! I'll let you know..

Ordered pizza and wings tonight. The wings are tasty and meaty, however 'hot' is more like medium. The pizza is so so. Better than dominos but nothing like a good NY pie. I'm pretty sure the crust is frozen. The place is cheap, and the pizza is edible, so I'll keep them on my call list.

Ordered here a couple of times. The food is alright. Nothing extravagant. I got some wings and also chicken and mushroom fettuccine. The pasta was kind of bland and I'm a little upset I paid $15 for tenders and there was no option to order fries with it as a meal. 

The guys who work here are always really kind though. Probably the main reason I ordered more than once.

Good Philly, good wings, good fries, gyros, and great lunch specials. The pizza is okay but I go there for the above mentioned items and not the pizza. I would give it 3.5 stars but pizza is sort of lacking if not I would give it 4.5. Still a very tasty place to grab a quick cheap bite.
BEST PLACE TO GO FOR WINGS! A reputable service of integrity. Friendly and all-round a great restaurant for delivery, dine-in, and to go. Love this place.

Pulled in off the street randomly because the family wanted pizza, and this was available. Quite simply, great food, EXCELLENT service, and great prices. Thank you to everyone at Fat Moe's for the delightful experience!

Do not order... super cheap food...

I ordered 2 Philly cheesesteaks with no green peppers. I kid you not there was more green peppers than there was anything else. There was also a lot of mushrooms and onions. I get it.. add veggies for flavor. But don't add veggies to skip out on meat so you can save a buck. 50 dollars later and honestly the quality was pretty terrible. Ordered chicken fingers as well and they were soaked in something other than sauce. Seem quite soggy! However their ranch was amazing! French fries were good.

We have come here a few times. The prices, food and guest service are really good. The only downside is that they don't have soft drinks in the fountain. They sell everything by bottle/can. They take all 4 of the major credit cards.  Good choice for a bite to eat.

I ordered take out wings and garlic fries from Fat Moe's and they were delicious. The guy at the front register was really nice and helpful. 

My reason for giving them 4 out of 5 stars is because of the way my order was put in. I asked for wings and garlic fries, so they guy put in my order as a French fries and wing combo with an extra side of garlic fries. This was entirely too much food for me and it was extra food that I did not order. I ended up throwing out the original fries, and it was waste of money.

All in all the food was very good. I would highly recommend checking your food order before paying, so you don't pay for extra food that you don't want.

This food is extremely half assed. In my opinion it's cheap so I didn't expect much. Ordered : 
fettuccini Alfredo with salad and garlic bread deal- the only thing that I didn't even eat. Threw the whole thing away. Salad was okay. Bread was half the size of a Texas toast slice (tiny). But the pasta... Oh my god. It smelled and tasted like feet. I'm not super picky and I don't know how you can mess up Alfredo sauce this bad but it was so gross it made my stomach turn. 
Grilled cheese- good. Hard to mess up a grilled cheese. 
Cheese sticks- good
Tiramisu - the cake was stale and dry. Barely any coffee flavor. 
Wouldn't order from here again. I tried their ranch and it's good pizza ranch. Maybe if I'm desperate I'll try the pizza one day.

Came across what seems to be the owner, he was nice at first then I gave him exact change with the price & I accidentally didn't give him enough change and got pissed at me and didn't tell me exactly what I gave him so I could correct it. Slammed the register and walked away. Very rude.

Today, we attempted the cheesesteak. I read the previous reviews and i seen cheese whiz. I tried a cheesesteak with onion, mushrooms, jalopenos and cheese whiz and boy was it yummy. Other places make great cheesesteaks but it's always missing the whiz and we found it. I enjoyed it and will have to try it again hopefully soon.

I ordered on the app "Slice". I was supposed to get $2.00 off with an online order. I ordered the meal of 2 Large 1-Topping and a 2 Liter for 19.95. The app gave me a total of 19.58. I thought it to be strange then in the restaurant and he says 21.40. Get the pizza home there's a strange smell from the pizza with bacon. It looked NOR tasted ANYTHING like bacon. It was like crumbles of the fatty part of the bacon. The pizza tasted REALLY cheap!! The crust was thin and sauce tasted like some generic store brand sauce but less flavor. I'm a PIZZA LOVER but this here was NOT worth the 21.40 I paid. I feel like I paid 21.40 for a two liter because this goes RIGHT to the garbage. I could have been satisfied and full with a $5 Hot and Ready!! Guess I know next time stick with the chain!!

Food is amazing always! Never frozen anything, so everything is fresh!!! Great deals, great food, and great people! Yes sometimes they forgot a few things, but were very fast in rectifying the situation! I have eaten here since they have opened, and I will keep eating their delicious food!!! Love this place!!!

My entire office ordered from Fat Moe's. Our delivery got to the office fast and everything was AMAZING with large portions too. The delivery guy was very kind and professional. Our food arrived hot and our drinks cold. Great Job!

We ordered a pizza with triple pepporonis. We got charged for all three orders of pepporonis and when we got the pizza it did not consist of triple pepporonis. Whwn we called to complain and speak to a manager, we got attitude. They offered to send us another pizza but after the intense conversation we didnt trust it.

Still great as always. Always super fast delivery and fresh food. Some of these reviews are pretty pathetic and childish. Dint bad mouth a business and give them 1 star because they couldn't understand you. You're obviously on Yelp so order on Eat24. It is simple and just as easy.  And then for those who like 3/4 of their food and then give 3 stars because you bought "cheap" food so you didn't expect much, get out of here with. Rate the service. Rate how fast they were. Let others worry about the taste of food.

This place is great! The guy that served me was super nice and made sure i had everything i needed with my order, it's a super small hidden gem and I'll definitely be coming back. The food is pretty delicious, well I've only had the wings and fries, but still, BOMB!
Great pizza place ! The owner is really nice and you can come in and get 2 slices and a drink for under $5. Plenty of seating and it is clean

Not a bad little pizza joint.  The pizza isn't my absolute favorite in town, but it's not bad. The wings however, are really good. Better than Wing Stop. The ranch is also amazing. Don't bother with the cheesecake, mine was frozen hard and had a weird chemical taste to it. Service is friendly.

Horrible delivery service. Was estimated an hour and finally received the delivery an hour and a half later. We ordered pizza and a salad. The pizza was cold. The toasted bread was soggy. And the salad lacked lettuce. We'll never order from here again. You're better off spending more money somewhere else.

I ordered a large cheese and mushroom pizza and when I got home part if the pizza had no cheese, there was a puddle of condensed water in the middle of the pizza. I immediately called and spoke to Donald who said he was the manager. I explained the condition of the pizza and he said" that's the way their pizza is because of the mushroom."  I told him I've ordered many cheese and mushrooms pizza and it didn't come out like this. Instead of expressing any sort of apology, he was like oh well.

We threw the entire pizza away and ordered a delicious pizza from dominos. 

Worse pizza, worse customer service ever.

Will be filing a complaint with BBB.

Loved every thing! 
Everyone in the family, from Toddlers to Adults,,have been impressed!
The food is awesome...highly recommend

Definitely a fan of Fat Moe's!

Yesterday, feeling absolutely awful, my fella decided to order in one of my favorite comfort foods: pizza. 

We didn't want to go with another chain, after having such a great experience at another Non-chain pizza place a couple weeks back.

Fat Moe's opens at 10:30am, and we called right at 10:30.  We were politely asked to call back in 5 minutes, but received a phone call within 3, saying they were sorry, and they were ready to take our order.

We ordered a 14 inch Fat Moe's Special:  Pepperoni, Sausage, Ground Beef, and ham, with onions, green peppers, olives, and mushrooms.  

We also ordered the ravioli with beef. 

35 minutes later, we had our food.

The ravioli was awesome.  Filled well, and cooked perfectly, and seasoned well.  I enjoyed them a lot, as did my fella.

The pizza was good too.  The crust could have been a touch crispier, and we definitely should have ordered extra cheese...but it was good!  The ingredients were good, and they use fresh mushrooms,not canned like some places.   

I will definitely order from here again!

I ordered phillysteak and the sandwich is so good. Yes it's a lot of bell peppers but admit it the food is good.the ranch is the best one. The guy who delivered my food is so friendly i will definitely order again and recommend this place to my friends and family.
Love the pizza , good wings , good prices , staff is great. They were quick with delivery too.
I love this place the food is always great I crave them all the time I also love fast delivery!

I ordered a beef shish kabobs in this place and very disappointed because it's not what I expected. Their shish kabobs is only two little strip of ground meat or hamburger meat. It's not worthed to pay a $10

This place has definitely improved since the new ownership. Good pizza and wings and great prices. Always good service and fast as well. I highly recommend going to this place for your local pizza spot.

Order here 2nd time and I'm very happy !!!
Food is delicious, delivery on time !
5 stars ! Thank you guys !

The pizza is super awesome! Had a slice of pepperoni and olives, loved it and I usually hate olives on my pizza. And the crust was sooo good. The staff is even better. Preston has to be one of the nicest guys I've met! I'm definitely gonna come back and try some other stuff.

I don't know what it was like before "new management" came along but keep it up. My coworker and I stumbled on this gem. They have a special for a large 2 topping pizza, so we got that with 2 drinks totaling about $15 (not bad). The pizza was GREAT. The sauce is delicious and taste fresh, they don't skimp on cheese, ranch is extra but tell me where it's not now a days. That also taste like homemade ranch not that running crap you get at other places. The people are friendly and nice. There isn't a lot of seating inside but I'm assuming they mostly do deliveries/take out. Give it a try!
Pizza was horrible, no flavor and had a feeling of sawdust on the crust. The wings were great!

Well, this place popped up recently and I was curious. Good choice on my part. 

We ordered fried mushrooms, 10 piece wings (hot) and a philly cheesteak (minus the peppers). Everything was fresh, cheap and delcious. 

FIrst off, the fried mushrooms. Best thing I ate. Delicious and crispy perfection. The wings had the right amount of spice. Not super hot for hot. The owner said the garlic wings were spicier, so I might have to try those next time. The cheesesteak was my fella's favorite. I let him take the lead on that one and he was extremely satisfied. 

They have free delivery and a pretty extensive menu (hamburgers, cheesteaks, fried apps, wings, pizza, dessert and pasta). I haven't been extremely tempted to try the other menu items based on reviews, so I stick to the cheesesteaks, fried apps and wings.
Everything about this place is amazing and worth the wait. Friendly customer service and AMAZING bbq wings!!!!
